segments.text: How are you ? I haven't heard from you in ages .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've been overseas , So have you been busy lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pretty busy.So are you back for good ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I was just wondering when you'd have time to go fishing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'm not working on the weekend , so we could grab some beer , ice and our fishing rods , and head out to the river .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds good . I've missed you my friend .
segments.speaker: S1
